The only thing I didn't like was they didn't have much dancing as I thought there would be, replacing some of it with the puppet show(which I thought was hilarious by the way)  Hate to be the one to judge, but personally I thought Christine was probably the worst singer along with her back up singers. A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat (Ginga Ueto) who has been brought up since puppyhood to be evil.
Based on the famous cat tale, this one and only film should not have been made, and is only watched because Kathie Pearden spends the film in panties.
